33 #ifdef CONTIKI_TARGET_MBXXX
34 extern char __Stack_Init, _estack;
35 
36 static inline void check_stack() {
37  const char *p = &__Stack_Init;
38  while (p < &_estack && *p == 0x38) {
39  p++;
40  }
41 
42  PRINTF("Stack: %d bytes used (%d free)\n", &_estack - p, p - &__Stack_Init);
43 }
44 #else /* CONTIKI_TARGET_MBXXX */
45 static inline void check_stack() {
46 }
47 #endif /* CONTIKI_TARGET_MBXXX */
48 #else /* WITH_CONTKI */
49 #define PRINTF(...)
50 
51 static inline void check_stack() {
52 }
53 #endif

56 typedef enum { DTLS_LOG_EMERG=0, DTLS_LOG_ALERT, DTLS_LOG_CRIT, DTLS_LOG_WARN,
57  DTLS_LOG_NOTICE, DTLS_LOG_INFO, DTLS_LOG_DEBUG
58 } log_t;

77 /*SWISTART*/
78 #ifndef __RTOS__
79 void dsrv_log(log_t level, char *format, ...);
80 #else /*__RTOS__*/
81 #define dsrv_log(dblv,fmt,...) lwm2m_printf(fmt, ##__VA_ARGS__)
82 #endif /*__RTOS__*/
83 /*SWISTOP*/
84 #else
85 #define dsrv_log(level, format, ...) PRINTF(format, ##__VA_ARGS__)
86 #endif

99 #define dtls_dsrv_hexdump_log(dblv, name, buf, len, ext) lwm2mcore_DataDump(name,buf,len)
100 #endif /*__RTOS__*/

121 #endif /* NDEBUG */
122 
123 /* A set of convenience macros for common log levels. */
124 #define dtls_emerg(...) dsrv_log(DTLS_LOG_EMERG, __VA_ARGS__)
125 #define dtls_alert(...) dsrv_log(DTLS_LOG_ALERT, __VA_ARGS__)
126 #define dtls_crit(...) dsrv_log(DTLS_LOG_CRIT, __VA_ARGS__)
127 #define dtls_warn(...) dsrv_log(DTLS_LOG_WARN, __VA_ARGS__)
128 #define dtls_notice(...) dsrv_log(DTLS_LOG_NOTICE, __VA_ARGS__)
129 #define dtls_info(...) dsrv_log(DTLS_LOG_INFO, __VA_ARGS__)
130 #define dtls_debug(...) dsrv_log(DTLS_LOG_DEBUG, __VA_ARGS__)
131 #define dtls_debug_hexdump(name, buf, length) dtls_dsrv_hexdump_log(DTLS_LOG_DEBUG, name, buf, length, 1)
132 #define dtls_debug_dump(name, buf, length) dtls_dsrv_hexdump_log(DTLS_LOG_DEBUG, name, buf, length, 0)
133 
134 #endif /* _DTLS_DEBUG_H_ */
